Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
    CraftableItem
    An interface which marks items as craftable.
    Healing
    Interface for any object that is capable of healing an actor
    HitProbability
    Interface for anything that defines its chance of hitting or missing when attacking.
    MenuAction
    Interface for actions that open menus to select another action
    Toggleable
    An interface for objects that can be switched between 2 states (such as a lever or door)
    Wallet
    An interface for objects in the game that can collect and spend coins
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AimerAction
    An action that will aim at a target with a selected gun.
    AmmunitionCartridge
    Cartridge of ammunition that holds a number of bullets for any gun.
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    Arm
    Represents an Arm and can be used as a weapon.
    AttackAction
    An action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Bite
    Class for a bite weapon.
    BuyAction
    An action for buying an item with coins
    ChantSpawnAction
    An action for spawning new zombies in random locations
    ChooseAimAction
    MenuAction that chooses who to aim at and increments the aim level.
    ChooseShootTargetAction
    Action that presents a sub menu to choose an actor to shoot at with a sniper.
    Coin
    A class representing a unit of the game's currency
    CollectCoinsAction
    An action for picking up coins from the ground (can do multiple at a time)
    CollectCoinsBehaviour
    A behaviour for picking up coins
    Corpse
    A Corpse.
    CraftAction
    An action for crafting a CraftableItem into a different item
    Crop
    A Crop class.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    DoNothingCustomMessageAction
    An action to do nothing, with a custom description of that action
    Door
    A class representing a door that can be opened and closed by an actor
    EatAction
    An action for eating food.
    EatBehaviour
    Class that determines how or whether a human can eat based on their inventory and the ground.
    EndLifeAction
    An action for instantly killing a actor
    FarmBehaviour
    Class that determines how or whether an actor can farm surroundings.
    Farmer
    Class for farmers, those that grow the food in the game.
    FarmerHarvestAction
    Class for Farmer Harvesting, rather than the item going into inventory it instead goes on the ground
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertiliseAction
    Class for the action that fertilises a crop
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    Food class, an item that can be eaten by humans and drops after harvesting a crop
    Gun
    Weapon item that can attack at range.
    HarvestAction
    An abstract class for harvesting a crop.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A behaviour for harvesting ripe crops and placing them in the actor's inventory
    Hoe
    Weapon used by farmers.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HumanHarvestAction
    Class for regular human's Harvesting, where the food is added to the actors inventory
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    Leg
    Represents a Leg and can be used as a weapon.
    Limb
    Represents a Zombie's limb and can be used as a weapon.
    MamboMarie
    A class representing the special game character Mambo Marie
    PickupWeaponBehaviour
    A class that generates a PickupItemAction if there is a weapon at the actor's location.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    Product
    A class representing a store product.
    Punch
    Class for a punch weapon.
    ReloadAction
    Action that is used to relaod a gun
    SetUpTurretAction
    Sets up a turret.
    ShootAction
    This is an action class that shoots either a target or group of targets and then decreases the ammunition in the gun
    Shop
    A class representing a shop
    ShopAction
    An action for shopping at a shop
    Shotgun
    Gun that shoots in cone shapes from the chosen direction.
    SniperRifle
    A class representing a sniper rifle As part of our bonus marks features, it can be crafted into a turret
    SowAction
    Action class for sowing a crop, will change the ground from dirt to crop.
    SubMenu
    An abstract class for sub-menus that branch off the main menu
    ToggleAction
    An action to toggle a Toggleable object
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    Turret
    A class representing a turret
    UseGunAction
    Action for shotgun that displays the submenu for shotgun.
    Vehicle
    A class representing a vehicle in the Zombie game.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieClub
    A weapon made from a zombie arm
    ZombieMace
    A weapon made from a zombie leg
    ZombieWorld
    The world class for the zombie game
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ZombieCapability
